java/liquibase/database/FirebirdDatabase.java

00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseSnapshot;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.MaxDBDatabaseSnapshot;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.FirebirdDatabaseSnapshot;
00008 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00009 import liquibase.diff.DiffStatusListener;
00010 
00011 import java.sql.Connection;
00012 import java.util.Set;
00013 
00018 public class FirebirdDatabase extends AbstractDatabase {
00019 
00020     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00021         return getDatabaseProductName(conn).startsWith("Firebird");
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00025         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:firebirdsql")) {
00026             return "org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBDriver";
00027         }
00028         return null;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public String getProductName() {
00032         return "Firebird";
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getTypeName() {
00036         return "firebird";
00037     }
00038 
00039 
00040     public boolean supportsSequences() {
00041         return true;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public String getBooleanType() {
00045         return "SMALLINT";
00046     }
00047 
00048     public String getCurrencyType() {
00049         return "DECIMAL(18, 4)";
00050     }
00051 
00052     public String getUUIDType() {
00053         return "CHAR(36)";
00054     }
00055 
00056     public String getClobType() {
00057         return "BLOB SUB_TYPE TEXT";
00058     }
00059 
00060     public String getBlobType() {
00061         return "BLOB";
00062     }
00063 
00064     public String getDateTimeType() {
00065         return "TIMESTAMP";
00066     }
00067 
00068     public boolean supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns() {
00069         return false;
00070     }
00071 
00072     public String getCurrentDateTimeFunction() {
00073         return "CURRENT_TIMESTAMP";
00074     }
00075 
00076     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00077         return false;
00078     }
00079 
00080 
00081     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00082         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT RDB$GENERATOR_NAME FROM RDB$GENERATORS WHERE RDB$SYSTEM_FLAG IS NULL OR RDB$SYSTEM_FLAG = 0");
00083     }
00084 
00085     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String viewName) throws JDBCException {
00086         String sql = "select rdb$view_source from rdb$relations where upper(rdb$relation_name)='" + viewName + "'";
00087 //        if (schemaName != null) {
00088 //            sql += " and rdb$owner_name='" + schemaName.toUpperCase() + "'";
00089 //        }
00090 //        if (getDefaultCatalogName() != null) {
00091 //            sql += " and table_catalog='" + getDefaultCatalogName() + "'";
00092 //
00093 //        }
00094         return new RawSqlStatement(sql);
00095     }
00096 
00097 
00098     public boolean supportsDDLInTransaction() {
00099         return false;
00100     }
00101 
00102 
00103     public String getTrueBooleanValue() {
00104         return "1";
00105     }
00106 
00107     public String getFalseBooleanValue() {
00108         return "0";
00109     }
00110 
00111 
00112     public boolean isSystemTable(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00113         return tableName.startsWith("RDB$") || super.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName);
00114     }
00115 
00116 
00117     public boolean supportsAutoIncrement() {
00118         return false;
00119     }
00120 
00121     public boolean supportsSchemas() {
00122         return false;
00123     }
00124 
00125     public String convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00126         if (requestedSchema == null) {
00127             return getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName();
00128         } else {
00129             return requestedSchema.toUpperCase();
00130         }
00131     }
00132 
00133     public String getColumnType(String columnType, Boolean autoIncrement) {
00134         String type = super.getColumnType(columnType, autoIncrement);
00135         if (type.startsWith("BLOB SUB_TYPE <0")) {
00136             return getBlobType();
00137         } else {
00138             return type;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142     public DatabaseSnapshot createDatabaseSnapshot(String schema, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00143         return new FirebirdDatabaseSnapshot(this, statusListeners, schema);
00144     }
00145 }
